  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_99983</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99983</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Renewable energy resources - geothermal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebsmittel der auswechselbaren Energie - 
geothermisch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressources énergétiques renouvelables - 
géothermiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recursos de energia renewable - geothermal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorse energetiche rinnovabili - geotermiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανανεώσιμα ενεργειακά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς - 
γεωθερμικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recursos energéticos reanudables - geotérmicos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how steam is produced by pumping water deep underground to hot rocks. This can be used to drive generators.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">generators</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geothermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">renewable energy resource</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steam</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Dampf durch Pumpwasser
tief unterirdisch zu den heißen Felsen produziert wird. Dieses 
kann an Generatorsätze gewöhntSEIN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment la vapeur est 
produite profondément sous terre par l'eau de pompage aux roches 
chaudes. Ceci peut être utilisé aux générateurs 
d'entraînement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o vapor é 
produzido pela água bombeando profundamente no subsolo às rochas 
quentes. Isto pode ser usado aos geradores de movimentação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come il vapore è 
prodotto dall'acqua di pompaggio in profondità nel sottosuolo alle 
roccie calde. Ciò può essere usata ai generatori di 
azionamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς ο ατμός παράγεται 
με να αντλήσει το ύδωρ βαθιά υπόγεια στους καυτούς βράχους. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να οδηγήσει τις 
γεννήτριες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el vapor es 
producido por el agua de bombeo profundamente subterráneamente a las 
rocas calientes. Esto se puede utilizar a los generadores de 
mecanismo impulsor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Generatoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geothermische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heiße Felsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfsmittel der auswechselbaren Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dampf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">générateurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">roches chaudes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ressource énergétique renouvelable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
